## {{< fa box-open title="an open box" >}} Anticipated deliverable(s) {#anticipated-deliverables}

By the end of today’s workshop, you should have:

- Next steps for updating/enhancing your LinkedIn profile
- Knowledge of how to search effectively for Bren alumni and how to best contact them
- A better understanding of LinkedIn’s role as a job search platform

## {{< fa book-open title="an open book" >}} Learning objectives {#learning-objectives}

By the end of today's workshop, you should be able to:

- Update the foundational sections of their LinkedIn accounts and gain knowledge of additional account enhancements
- Learn how to effectively search for and contact alumni via LinkedIn
- Understand the pros and cons of LinkedIn as a job search tool and how to stand out

## {{< fa clipboard-list title="a clipboard with a To Do list" >}} Pre-workshop Prep {#pre-workshop-prep}

- Reflect on your Fall Career Team meetings and fall quarter.  Add any suggestions or new items to your LinkedIn profile
- Read the [LinkedIn 101](https://brenconnect.bren.ucsb.edu/s/login/?ec=302&startURL=%2Fs%2Farticle%2FLinkedIn-101-How-to-Build-Your-Profile-Grow-Your-Network-and-Use-LinkedIn-for-Your-Job-Internship-Search){target="_blank"} article on BrenConnect
